amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit funding from being used to implement a January 13, 2017 effort by the U.S. Department of Interior and Agriculture to restrict all leasing, exploration, and potential development of approximately 234,328 acres of federal land in Northeast Minnesota.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Emmer amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Emmer.
